docs.snippet: Clay Benskin, a photographer with no formal training, takes pictures of a city in which surveillance is so pervasive the people under its eye no longer notice it.

docs.snippet: Announcements of several of President-elect Donald J. Trump’s cabinet posts are helping to define his approach to issues at home.

headline.print_headline: Cabinet Picks Portend a Shift Far to the Right
headline.main: Carson Is New Sign Trump Plans to Govern From the Right

docs.abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump announces he will nominate Ben Carson as secretary of housing and development, latest in series of cabinet choices that indicate Trump's administration will be ideologically conservative; is soon expected to fill series of positions that will accelerate shift from Pres Obama's policies.

docs.snippet: The rather ordinary village of Kidlington has become a popular stop for Chinese visitors who snap photographs of its simple homes, bushes and streets.

docs.snippet: Hungary's largest left-wing political newspaper suspended publication because of "considerable" losses, its owner said Saturday. The move was condemned by opposition parties across the political spectrum, who accused Prime Minister Viktor Orban's ...
